law.history: Repealed 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 146, effective July 1, 1982. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 290, sec. 2, effective June 17, 1978. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2153, 4711-a.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Powers and duties of committee -- Personal charge may be given to another person -- Compensation.
metadata.note: 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 396, sec. 150 would have repealed this section effective July 1, 1982. However, 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 396 was repealed by 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 146, also effective July 1, 1982.
